General.Name: Acter Co Ltd
General.Description: Acter Group Corporation Limited provides engineering services in Taiwan, Mainland China, and other Asian countries. The company offers construction, design, and maintenance services related to air conditioning; and environmental control, clean room set-up, ventilation engineering, and energy technology services. It also trades in ice water machines and energy storing equipment; and offers turnkey services. In addition, the company is involved in the wholesale of electronic and chemical equipment; construction and set-up of freezing and electronic equipment, and air conditioners; construction business; design and manufacture of air and liquid containers; and trading of clean rooms and air conditioners. Further, it engages in machinery trading; piping engineering, cable installation, and automatic control equipment engineering, etc.; and set-up of electronic protection systems and central air conditioners. The company was incorporated in 1979 and is headquartered in Taichung, Taiwan.

3.Name: Ms. Yun-Han  Tsao
3.Title: Principal Financial & Accounting Officer, Assistant VP of Financial Division and Company Sec.
